entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Edmonton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:43 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Edmonton Blatchford 06:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: -10.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 82 %
Dewpoint: -12.4°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday: Freezing rain mixed with snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Freezing rain at times mixed with snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 06:41 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 06:41 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 06:41 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
